metadata.name: Password Protected ZIP File Opened (Email Attachment)
metadata.comment: Detects the extraction of password protected ZIP archives. See the filename variable for more details on which file has been opened.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('11') AND metadata.event_code = 5379 AND contains(lower(file.name), lower('microsoft_windows_shell_zipfolder:filename')) AND contains(lower(file.name), lower('\\temporary internet files\\content.outlook')))

output.summary: Detects the extraction of password protected ZIP archives. See the filename variable for more details on which file has been opened.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate used of encrypted ZIP files Reference: https://twitter.com/sbousseaden/status/1523383197513379841
